articles.description: Follow live text updates as Liverpool, West Ham, Brighton and Aston Villa all play in Europe.
articles.title: West Ham and Brighton in early European action - build-up

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary and follow text updates as managerless Rangers face Aris Limassol in Cyprus before Aberdeen host HJK Helsinki.
articles.title: Europa League: Managerless Rangers face Aris Limassol in Cyprus

articles.description: New Zealand need a bonus-point win over Uruguay to confirm a Rugby World Cup quarter-final spot - follow text and radio commentary.
articles.title: Rugby World Cup: All Blacks look to secure quarter-final spot

articles.description: West Ham won their second Europa League match after resisting a second-half fightback to beat Freiburg.
articles.title: West Ham win at Freiburg as Aguerd sinks hosts

articles.description: England's thrashing at the hands of New Zealand is a worry, but there are reasons not to lose hope on their World Cup defence just yet.
articles.title: 'England's defeat is a worry but don't panic yet'

articles.description: Watch live coverage of Jake Jarman and James Hall in the men's all-around final at the World Gymnastics Championships 2023 in Antwerp, Belgium.
articles.title: Watch: World Gymnastics Championships - GB's Jarman & Hall in all-around final

articles.description: England's defence of their World Cup title begins with a nine-wicket hammering at the hands of New Zealand in Ahmedabad, India.
articles.title: England thrashed by NZ in World Cup opener

articles.description: Reigning champions Glasgow City and last season's runners-up Celtic meet for the first time in this season's SWPL.
articles.title: SWPL: Last term's top two meet as Glasgow City host Celtic

articles.description: Joao Pedro scores a late penalty as Brighton fight back from two goals down to earn their first point in European football.
articles.title: Late Pedro penalty earns Brighton draw at Marseille

articles.description: Steven Davis' stint as caretaker manager gets off to the worst possible start as a dismal Rangers slump to Europa League defeat away to Aris Limassol.
articles.title: Lacklustre Rangers beaten by Aris in Europa League
